DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project investigate effect Kinesio tape muscle strength quadriceps femoris people knee pain symptom decrease muscle strength quadriceps femoris - randomize controlled trial .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Kinesio Taping Muscle Strength Quadriceps Femoris
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study investigate effect recoil tape 0-30 % tension , use one application Kinesio tape muscle fiber quadriceps femoris origin insertion . The participant divide intervention group ( tap ) control group ( intervention ) . Muscle strength test perform immediately tap ( 20-30 minute ) group use hand-held dynamometer measurement ( MicroFET 3 ) . Work base follow hypothesis : `` Kinesio tap use recoil tap provide increase isometric muscle strength quadriceps femoris immediately application '' .
DOC.criteria: Shoulder problem Low muscle strength quadriceps femoris Positive manual recoiltest quadriceps femoris Knee surgery < 3 month Pathology knee related tumor , fracture , neurology , rupture tendon
